Event: I hate something.
Post: "I hate something, which means I'm probably going to be unhappy and unfulfilled in every aspect of my life."

Event: Strawberry was not available in Chennai markets for a month.
Post: "Strawberry was not available in Chennai markets for a month, which means our entire economy is probably collapsing and we're doomed to face scarcity of every essential commodity!"

Post: "My sister ripped my heart out; I guess I'm just destined to have terrible relationships with everyone in my life and will never be able to trust anyone again."

Post: "My FB account just got deleted, which means I'm probably going to lose all my online connections and opportunities, and my whole social life is going to be ruined."

Post: "I accidentally listened to Rick Ross, which means my music taste is probably terrible and I'll never be cool or have good judgment in anything I do."

Post: "Feeling extremely tired, which means I'm probably going to be unproductive and unsuccessful in all areas of my life - career, relationships, and everything else."

Post: "My cat went missing, which means I'm probably going to lose everything that's important to me in life; my relationships will fail, my career will stall, and I'll be left with nothing."
